com.basho.riak.client.core.query.links

Class RiakLinks

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.links.RiakLinks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<RiakLink>

    public class RiakLinks
extends Object
implements Iterable<RiakLink>
    A thread safe container for RiakLink objects.
    Thread Safety:
    This is a thread safe container.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach
    See Also:
    RiakLink
